CustomField.formula:
IF (Contact_Score__c <=30, IMAGE("/img/samples/stars_100.gif","1 Star"),
IF (Contact_Score__c <=50, IMAGE("/img/samples/stars_200.gif","2 Star"),
IF (Contact_Score__c <=70, IMAGE("/img/samples/stars_300.gif","3 Star"),
IF (Contact_Score__c <=90, IMAGE("/img/samples/stars_400.gif","4 Star"),
IMAGE("/img/samples/stars_500.gif","5 Star")))))
CustomField.label: Contact Ranking
